languages.text: "Слава о вашем величии растет и множится — не только на палубах этого судна, но и по всему протекторату. Ваше имя внушает ужас и трепет, которых достаточно, чтобы люди не поминали вас напрасно... или же призывали вас в молитвах о самом сокровенном. Да, Лорд-капитан, ваше имя... порой начинает заменять Его имя в устах простолюдинов. Есть же и те, кто давно чтит вас как послан{mf|ца|ницу} истинных богов".

traits.locale_text: "Слава о вашем величии растет и множится — не только на палубах этого судна, но и по всему протекторату. Ваше имя внушает ужас и трепет, которых достаточно, чтобы люди не поминали вас напрасно... или же призывали вас в молитвах о самом сокровенном. Да, Лорд-капитан, ваше имя... порой начинает заменять Его имя в устах простолюдинов. Есть же и те, кто давно чтит вас как послан{mf|ца|ницу} истинных богов".

languages.text: "Glorious tales of your majesty travel far and wide, not only across the decks of this vessel, but also throughout the protectorate. Your name instils enough fear and awe that people think twice before uttering it without reason... or they call on you in their most desperate prayers. Yes, Lord Captain, at times... your name is spoken instead of His among the commoners. Of course, there are also those who have long since honoured you as a messenger of the true gods."
languages.original_text: "Слава о вашем величии растет и множится — не только на палубах этого судна, но и по всему протекторату. Ваше имя внушает ужас и трепет, которых достаточно, чтобы люди не поминали вас напрасно... или же призывали вас в молитвах о самом сокровенном. Да, Лорд-капитан, ваше имя... порой начинает заменять Его имя в устах простолюдинов. Есть же и те, кто давно чтит вас как послан{mf|ца|ницу} истинных богов".

traits.locale_text: "Glorious tales of your majesty travel far and wide, not only across the decks of this vessel, but also in the entire protectorate. Your name instills fear and thrill strong enough to prevent people from mentioning you without a reason... and make them call you in their prayers of the dearest. Yes, Lord Captain, at times... your name begins sounding in place of His name among the commoners. Some of them even honour you as a messenger of the true gods."

"Glorious tales of your majesty travel far and wide, not only across the decks of this vessel, but also in the entire protectorate. Your name instills fear and thrill strong enough to prevent people from mentioning you without a reason... and make them call you in their prayers of the dearest. Yes, Lord Captain, at times... your name begins sounding in place of His name among the commoners. Some of them even honour you as a messenger of the true gods."

"Glorious tales of your majesty travel far and wide, not only across the decks of this vessel, but also throughout the protectorate. Your name instils enough fear and awe that people think twice before uttering it without reason... or they call on you in their most desperate prayers. Yes, Lord Captain, at times... your name is even starting to replace His among the commoners. There are some who honour you as a messenger of the true gods."

"Glorious tales of your majesty travel far and wide, not only across the decks of this vessel, but also throughout the protectorate. Your name instils enough fear and awe that people think twice before uttering it without reason... or they call on you in their most desperate prayers. Yes, Lord Captain, at times... your name is even starting to replace His among the commoners. There are some who honour you as a messenger of the true gods."

"Glorious tales of your majesty travel far and wide, not only across the decks of this vessel, but also throughout the protectorate. Your name instils enough fear and awe that people think twice before uttering it without reason... or they call on you in their most desperate prayers. Yes, Lord Captain, at times... your name is spoken instead of His among the commoners. Of course, there are also those who have long since honoured you as a messenger of the true gods."

languages.text: “您的光荣传说流传甚广，不仅整艘船的甲板上人人皆知，更是在您的王朝中家喻户晓。您的名字让人们充满了人们恐惧与敬畏，如果有谁打算无缘无故说出这个名字，都会三思而后行……他们还会在最绝望的祈祷中呼唤您的大名。没错，舰长大人，有的时候……那些平民甚至用您的名字代替了神皇的名字。当然，还有很多人从很久以前就虔诚地坚信您是诸位真神的使者。”
languages.original_text: "Glorious tales of your majesty travel far and wide, not only across the decks of this vessel, but also throughout the protectorate. Your name instils enough fear and awe that people think twice before uttering it without reason... or they call on you in their most desperate prayers. Yes, Lord Captain, at times... your name is spoken instead of His among the commoners. Of course, there are also those who have long since honoured you as a messenger of the true gods."

traits.locale_text: “您的光荣传说流传甚广，不仅整艘船的甲板上人人皆知，更是在您的王朝中家喻户晓。您的名字让人们充满了人们恐惧与敬畏，如果有谁打算无缘无故说出这个名字，都会三思而后行……他们还会在最绝望的祈祷中呼唤您的大名。没错，舰长大人，有的时候……那些平民甚至用您的名字代替了神皇的名字。当然，还有很多人从很久以前就虔诚地坚信您是诸位真神的使者。”

languages.text: « Les récits de vos hauts faits sont relatés partout désormais, des ponts de votre vaisseau aux confins du protectorat. Votre nom inspire tant la peur et l'admiration que chacun y réfléchit à deux fois avant de le prononcer... et les fidèles l'appellent dans leurs prières les plus désespérées. Oui, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}... il arrive que le peuple vous invoque, vous, plutôt que l'Empereur. Et puis, il y a aussi ceux qui vous rendent grâce et vous considèrent depuis longtemps comme {mf|un messager|une messagère} des véritables dieux. »
languages.original_text: "Glorious tales of your majesty travel far and wide, not only across the decks of this vessel, but also throughout the protectorate. Your name instils enough fear and awe that people think twice before uttering it without reason... or they call on you in their most desperate prayers. Yes, Lord Captain, at times... your name is spoken instead of His among the commoners. Of course, there are also those who have long since honoured you as a messenger of the true gods."

traits.locale_text: « Les récits de vos hauts faits sont relatés partout désormais, des ponts de votre vaisseau aux confins du protectorat. Votre nom inspire tant la peur et l'admiration que chacun y réfléchit à deux fois avant de le prononcer... et les fidèles l'appellent dans leurs prières les plus désespérées. Oui, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}... il arrive que le peuple vous invoque, vous, plutôt que l'Empereur. Et puis, il y a aussi ceux qui vous rendent grâce et vous considèrent depuis longtemps comme {mf|un messager|une messagère} des véritables dieux. »

languages.text: 「陛下のあまねく雄大な旅についての壮大なる物語は、船のデッキだけではなく保護領全域に知れわたっております。あなた様の名は、民がみだりに口にするのをためらうほど…もしくは、最大限の祈りを込めて及びするほどに、恐怖と畏敬を植え付けております。ええ、ロード・キャプテン、時には…大衆の間であなた様の名は、主の代わりに唱えられているのです。もちろん、陛下を神々の真なる使者と崇める者もいるほどです」
languages.original_text: "Glorious tales of your majesty travel far and wide, not only across the decks of this vessel, but also throughout the protectorate. Your name instils enough fear and awe that people think twice before uttering it without reason... or they call on you in their most desperate prayers. Yes, Lord Captain, at times... your name is spoken instead of His among the commoners. Of course, there are also those who have long since honoured you as a messenger of the true gods."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下のあまねく雄大な旅についての壮大なる物語は、船のデッキだけではなく保護領全域に知れわたっております。あなた様の名は、民がみだりに口にするのをためらうほど…もしくは、最大限の祈りを込めて及びするほどに、恐怖と畏敬を植え付けております。ええ、ロード・キャプテン、時には…大衆の間であなた様の名は、主の代わりに唱えられているのです。もちろん、陛下を神々の真なる使者と崇める者もいるほどです」

languages.text: «Los gloriosos relatos de su majestad viajan a lo largo y ancho, no solo de la nave sino de vuestro protectorado. Su nombre inspira tanta admiración y temor que la gente se lo piensa dos veces antes de pronunciarlo en vano... y acude a usted en sus más desesperadas plegarias. Sí, Lord Capitán, en ocasiones... su nombre incluso empieza a aparecer en vez del nombre del Emperador entre la plebe. Y, naturalmente, también hay quien hace mucho que os honra como mensajer{mf|o|a} de los Dioses Verdaderos».
languages.original_text: "Glorious tales of your majesty travel far and wide, not only across the decks of this vessel, but also throughout the protectorate. Your name instils enough fear and awe that people think twice before uttering it without reason... or they call on you in their most desperate prayers. Yes, Lord Captain, at times... your name is spoken instead of His among the commoners. Of course, there are also those who have long since honoured you as a messenger of the true gods."

traits.locale_text: «Los gloriosos relatos de su majestad viajan a lo largo y ancho, no solo de la nave sino de vuestro protectorado. Su nombre inspira tanta admiración y temor que la gente se lo piensa dos veces antes de pronunciarlo en vano... y acude a usted en sus más desesperadas plegarias. Sí, Lord Capitán, en ocasiones... su nombre incluso empieza a aparecer en vez del nombre del Emperador entre la plebe. Y, naturalmente, también hay quien hace mucho que os honra como mensajer{mf|o|a} de los Dioses Verdaderos».

languages.text: "Glorreiche Geschichten von Eurer Erhabenheit verbreiten sich weithin, nicht nur auf den Decks dieses Schiffs, sondern im gesamten Protektorat. Euer Name sorgt für derart viel Angst und Ehrfurcht, dass die Leute sich gut überlegen, ob sie ihn grundlos aussprechen ... oder Euch in ihren verzweifeltsten Gebeten anrufen. Ja, Lord Captain, manchmal ... wird in Gesprächen des Pöbels Euer Name gesprochen statt des seinen. Natürlich gibt es auch einige, die Euch seit langem als {mf|Boten|Botin} der wahren Götter verehren."
languages.original_text: "Glorious tales of your majesty travel far and wide, not only across the decks of this vessel, but also throughout the protectorate. languages.text: "Hakkınızdaki pek görkemli hikâyeler; yalnızca bu geminin güvertelerinde değil, protektoranızın dört bir yanında anlatılıyor. İsminiz öyle bir korku ve huşu uyandırıyor ki insanlar, sebepsiz yere dillendirmeden iki kez dönüşüyor... Hatta en çaresiz anlarında ettikleri dualarda zikrediyorlar. Evet Lord Kaptan, kimileyin... Halk, O'nun yerine size sığınıyor. Elbette sizi uzun zamandır Gerçek Tanrılar'ın elçisi olarak onurlandıranlar da var."
languages.original_text: "Glorious tales of your majesty travel far and wide, not only across the decks of this vessel, but also throughout the protectorate. Your name instils enough fear and awe that people think twice before uttering it without reason... or they call on you in their most desperate prayers. Yes, Lord Captain, at times... your name is spoken instead of His among the commoners. Of course, there are also those who have long since honoured you as a messenger of the true gods."
